title: plat support main looking for a team
body:
Im very experienced have over 1000 games, i am perfect for a team that needs a certain playing style as i will happily adapt to how you want and need me to play. can play both aggressive and reactive in lane and will always roam when suited to help other lanes. my main priorities is to win the game through overwhelming the enemy with deep vision and making quick efficient picks then rotating to an objective.

i really want to test my skills in a team to see how i go, i can play most supports and if i can't play a champion you require i will make sure to practice until perfection. always open to criticism and will make sure that my mistakes won't happen more than once.

send me a message in game if you just want to see how i play :) 

- canofkungfu
